header: The Parable of the Lost Sheep

verse: All the tax collectors and sinners were approaching to listen to Him.
And the Pharisees and scribes were complaining, “This man welcomes sinners and eats with them!”
So He told them this parable:

header: The Parable of the Lost Coin
The Parable of the Lost Son

verse: He also said: “A man had two sons.
